AI Description: SciPy is an open-source Python library that is used for scientific and technical computing. It provides efficient algorithms for numerical integration, optimization, linear algebra, interpolation, and more. SciPy builds on NumPy arrays for high-performance array operations and adds modules for statistics, signal processing, image processing, and other scientific computing tasks.
Core Features: Numerical Integration & Optimization, Linear Algebra Operations, Interpolation & Curve Fitting, Statistics & Signal Processing, Image Processing, Sparse Matrix Operations
General Tags: Scientific Computing, Numerical Algorithms, Python Library, Data Analysis, Signal Processing
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences
